00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00075 static double R_INLINE sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00076 {
00077     double ans = 0;
00078     int i;
00079 
00080     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00081     return ans;
00082 }
00083 
00092 static int R_INLINE Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00093 {
00094     int i;
00095     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00096     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00097     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00098 }

00111 static double R_INLINE
00112 *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00113 {
00114     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00115     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00116 }

00126 static double R_INLINE
00127 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* deviance)
00128 {
00129     double sigma = 1;
00130 
00131     if (dims[useSc_POS])
00132         sigma =
00133             sqrt((deviance[wrss_POS] + deviance[usqr_POS])/
00134                  ((double)(dims[n_POS] -
00135                            (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))));
00136     return sigma;
00137 }

00147 static double
00148 chm_log_det2(CHM_FR L)
00149 {
00150     double ans = 0;
00151     int i;
00152 
00153     if (L->is_super) {
00154         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00155             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00156                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00157             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00158 
00159             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00160                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00161             }
00162         }
00163     } else {
00164         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00165         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00166         
00167         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00168             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00169             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00170             ans += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00171         }
00172     }
00173     return ans;
00174 }
00175 
00189 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00190 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00191 {
00192     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00193 
00194     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00195         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00196         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00197 
00198         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00199         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00200         nc[i] = nci;
00201         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00202     }
00203     return ans;
00204 }
00205 
00220 static int
00221 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00222        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00223 {
00224     int ans, i, p;
00225 
00226     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00227     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00228         int zrow = zi[p];
00229         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00230 
00231         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00232         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00233             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00234             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00235                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00236         }
00237     }
00238     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00239     return ans;
00240 }

00248 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00249 {
00250     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
00251         permP = GET_SLOT(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_LSym), lme4_permSym);
00252     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00253         *perm = INTEGER(permP), i, k,
00254         m = LENGTH(permP), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00255     double *b = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
00256         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)), one = 1;
00257     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00258     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00259     R_CheckStack(); 
00260 
00261     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00262                                 /* inverse permutation */
00263     for (i = 0; i < m; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
00264     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00265         for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00266             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00267             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00268             for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00269         }
00270         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00271             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00272                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00273         }
00274     }
00275 }

00286 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00287 {
00288     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00289         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00290         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00291         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00292     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00293         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00294     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00295         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00296         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00297     R_CheckStack();
00298     
00299     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00300     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00301     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00302     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00303         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00304         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00305             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00306             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00307                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00308             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00309         }
00310     }
00311     return R_NilValue;
00312 }

00322 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00323 {
00324     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00325     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00326     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00327         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00328         double *st = REAL(STi);
00329         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00330         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00331 
00332         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00333             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00334         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00335             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00336                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00337     }
00338     return pars;
00339 }

00348 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00349 {
00350     SEXP ans =
00351         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00352                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00353     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00354     UNPROTECT(1); 
00355     return ans;
00356 }
00357 
00365 static void
00366 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00367 {
00368     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00369     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00370     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym)),
00371         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00372     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00373         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00374         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00375     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00376     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00377     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00378         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00379         one[] = {1,0};
00380     R_CheckStack();
00381 
00382     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00383                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00384     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00385         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00386         double *sti = st[i];
00387 
00388         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00389             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00390         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00391             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00392                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00393     }
00394                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00395                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00396     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00397     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00398         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00399         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00400             int pv = vp[j];
00401             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00402                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00403                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00404                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00405                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00406             }
00407         }
00408     }
00409                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00410     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00411         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00412             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00413                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00414 
00415                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00416                 else {
00417                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00418                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00419                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00420                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00421                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00422                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00423                 }
00424             }
00425                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00426     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00427         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00428         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00429     }
00430 }

00441 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00442 {
00443     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00444 
00445     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00446         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00447     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00448     return R_NilValue;
00449 }

00459 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00460 {
00461     int w = asInteger(which),
00462         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00463                 
00464     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00465                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00466 }
00467 
00475 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00476 {
00477     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00478         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00479     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00480     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00481     int i, j, k;
00482     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00483     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00484     CHM_DN dm1;
00485     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00486     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00487         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00488     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00489     R_CheckStack();
00490 
00491     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00492     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00493     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)));
00494     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00495         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00496         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00497                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00498                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00499 
00500         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00501         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00502         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00503         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00504             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00505         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00506             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00507             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00508                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i]];
00509             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00510             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00511             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00512             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00513             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00514             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00515             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00516             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00517             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00518                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00519                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00520                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00521                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00522             }
00523         }
00524         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00525     }
00526     UNPROTECT(1);
00527     return ans;
00528 }
00529 
00537 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP C)
00538 {
00539     double one[] = {1, 0};
00540     int fll = c.final_ll;
00541     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(C);
00542     CHM_FR L;
00543     R_CheckStack();
00544 
00545     c.final_ll = 1;
00546     L = M_cholmod_analyze(cC, &c);
00547     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(cC, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00548         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00549               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00550     c.final_ll = fll;
00551 
00552     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00553 }

00556 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00557 
00558 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00559 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00560 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00561 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00562 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00563 
00564 
00574 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00575 {
00576     SEXP X = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
00577         moff = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00578         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00579     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00580     int i, ione = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
00581     int nans = n * dims[s_POS];
00582     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00583         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00584         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00585         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00586         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00587         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00588         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00589         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00590         one[] = {1,0};
00591     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00592     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00593     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, nans, 1),
00594         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym));
00595     R_CheckStack();
00596 
00597                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00598     if (LENGTH(moff)) Memcpy(eta, REAL(moff), nans);
00599     else AZERO(eta, nans);
00600                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00601     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &nans, &p, one, REAL(X), &nans,
00602                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &ione,
00603                     one, eta, &ione);
00604                                 /* eta := eta + V P' u */
00605     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00606     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00607         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00608     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00609 
00610     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00611         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00612         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00613         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00614         
00615         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00616             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00617                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00618             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00619                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00620                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00621             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00622         }
00623         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00624         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00625             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00626         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00627         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00628             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00629         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00630         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00631             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00632                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00633                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00634                                  * pnames has been checked */
00635         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00636         UNPROTECT(1);
00637         eta = REAL(vv);
00638     }
00639                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00640     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00641         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00642         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00643             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00644                 double etai = eta[i];
00645                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00646                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00647                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00648                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00649             }
00650             break;
00651         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00652             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00653                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00654                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00655             }
00656             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00657                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00658                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00659                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00660                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00661                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00662                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00663                 muEta[i] =
00664                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00665             }
00666             break;
00667         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00668             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00669                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00670                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00671                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00672             }
00673             break;
00674         default:
00675             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00676         } 
00677     } else {
00678         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00679     }
00680 
00681     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00682     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00683         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (swt ? swt[i] : 1);
00684         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00685     }
00686                                 /* store u'u */
00687     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00688     
00689     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00690 }
00691 
00702 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00703 {
00704     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00705 }
00706 
00717 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00718 {
00719     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00720     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00721     int j, jv, lv = LENGTH(vP),
00722         n = dims[n_POS], p, s = dims[s_POS];
00723     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00724         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00725         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00726         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00727         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00728         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00729         one[] = {1,0};
00730     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00731     CHM_SP A = C;
00732     int *ai = (int*) NULL, *ap = (int*) NULL,
00733         *vi = (int*) C->i, *vp = (int*) C->p;
00734     double *ax = (double*) NULL, *vx = (double*) C->x;
00735     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00736     R_CheckStack();
00737 
00738     if (lv || muEta || swt) {   /* must generate A from C */
00739         A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00740         R_CheckStack();
00741         ai = (int*)(A->i); ap = (int*)(A->p); ax = (double*)(A->x);
00742         
00743         if (lv) { /* apply the gradient from the nonlinear model */
00744             double *grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00745             
00746             AZERO(ax, ap[n]);
00747             for (jv = 0; jv < n * s; jv++) {
00748                 int iv, ja = jv % n, ia;
00749                 for (iv = vp[jv]; iv < vp[jv + 1]; iv++) {
00750                     for (ia = ap[ja]; ia < ap[ja + 1]; ia++)
00751                         if (ai[ia] == vi[iv]) break;
00752                     if (ia == ap[ja + 1])
00753                         error(_("Structure of A incompatible with C, jv = %d, iv = %d"),
00754                               jv, iv);
00755                     ax[ia] += grad[jv] * vx[iv];
00756                 }
00757             }
00758         } else {                /* copy contents of C to A */
00759             Memcpy(ax, vx, ap[n]);
00760         }
00761 
00762         if (swt) {              /* update swt and res. Apply swt and,
00763                                  * if used, muEta to A */
00764             double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
00765                 *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym);
00766             d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00767             for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00768                 swt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / (var ? var[j] : 1));
00769                 res[j] = swt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00770                 d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00771                 for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00772                     ax[p] *= (muEta ? muEta[j] : 1) * swt[j];
00773             }
00774         }
00775     }
00776 
00777     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00778         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00779               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00780     d[ldL2_POS] = chm_log_det2(L);
00781     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00782 }
00783 
00795 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00796 {
00797     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00798 }
00799 
00801 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00802 
00803 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00804 
00805 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00806 
00816 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00817 {
00818     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00819     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00820     double
00821         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00822         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)),
00823         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00824         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, one[] = {1,0},
00825         step, zero[] = {0,0};
00826     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double),
00827         *uold = Alloca(q, double);
00828     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00829     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00830         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00831     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00832     R_CheckStack();
00833 
00834     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00835     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00836 
00837     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00838      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00839      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00840      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00841 
00842     AZERO(u, q);
00843     update_mu(x);
00844     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00845 
00846         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00847         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00848                                 /* tmp := A %*% W^{1/2} %*% (y-mu) */
00849         if (!(M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 0 /* no trans */, one, zero,
00850                                cres, ctmp, &c))) 
00851             error(_("cholmod_sdmult returned error code"));
00852                                 /* tmp := P %*% tmp - u */
00853         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_P, L, ctmp, &c);
00854         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] = ((double*)(sol->x))[j] - u[j];
00855         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00856                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00857         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00858             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00859         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00860         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00861                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00862         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00863         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00864                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00865         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00866             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00867         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00868         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00869 
00870         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00871             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00872             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00873             if (verb < 0)
00874                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00875                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00876             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00877                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00878                 break;
00879             }
00880         }
00881         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00882     }
00883     return i;
00884 }
00885 
00897 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
00898 {
00899     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
00900 }
00901 
00910 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00911 {
00912     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00913 }
00914 
00922 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
00923 {
00924     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
00925     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00926     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
00927 
00928     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
00929     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
00930         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
00931         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
00932         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00933             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00934             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
00935             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
00936 
00937         d[disc_POS] = 0;
00938         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00939         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
00940         case 2:
00941             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00942                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00943                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00944                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00945             }
00946             break;
00947         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00948             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00949                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00950                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00951                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00952             }
00953             break;
00954         default:
00955             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
00956         }
00957     }
00958 
00959     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00960     return R_NilValue;
00961 }
00962 
00971 SEXP mer_update_effects(SEXP x)
00972 {
00973     SEXP muEta = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00974         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00975     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00976     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00977     R_CheckStack();
00978 
00979     if (!(LENGTH(muEta) || LENGTH(v))) { /* linear mixed model */
00980         SEXP uvec = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
00981         int ione = 1, p = dims[p_POS], pp1 = dims[p_POS] + 1,
00982             q = dims[q_POS];
00983         double *RXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
00984             *RVXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
00985             *dev = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00986             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
00987             *u = REAL(uvec), mone = -1, one = 1;
00988         CHM_DN cu = AS_CHM_DN(uvec), sol;
00989         R_CheckStack();
00990 
00991         Memcpy(fixef, RXy + p * pp1, p);
00992         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RXy, &pp1, fixef, &ione);
00993         Memcpy(u, RVXy + p * q, q);
00994         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, RVXy, &q,
00995                         fixef, &ione, &one, u, &ione);
00996         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00997             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00998         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00999         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01000         dev[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
01001         dev[disc_POS] = exp(dev[lpdisc_POS]) - dev[usqr_POS];
01002     }
01003     update_ranef(x);
01004     return R_NilValue;
01005 }
01006 
01018 SEXP mer_create_C(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01019 {
01020     SEXP ans;
01021     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01022         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01023     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01024     R_CheckStack();
01025 
01026                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01027     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01028         return duplicate(Zt);
01029                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01030     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01031     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01032     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01033     R_CheckStack();
01034 
01035     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01036     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01037     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01038         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01039         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01040     }
01041     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01042                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01043     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01044     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01045     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01046                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01047     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01048     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01049     vp[0] = 0;
01050     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01051     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01052                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01053     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01054     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01055     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01056         int i, pos = vp[j];
01057         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01058         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01059     }
01060                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01061     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01062     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01063 
01064     UNPROTECT(1); 
01065     return ans;
01066 }
01067 
01080 static void
01081 PAWv(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01082       const double *swt, const double *v, int n, int q)
01083 {
01084     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), j, k, p;
01085     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(q, double);
01086     R_CheckStack();
01087 
01088     AZERO(tmp, q);
01089     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01090         double mm = v[j] * (swt ? swt[j] : 1);
01091         for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01092             tmp[ai[p]] += mm * ax[p];
01093     }
01094     for (k = 0; k < q; k++)     /* apply P */
01095         dest[k] = tmp[perm ? perm[k] : k];
01096 }
01097 
01112 static void
01113 weighted_XytXy(double *rxy, const double *swt, double *X,
01114                double *y, int n, int p)
01115 {
01116     int i, ione = 1, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01117     double one = 1, zero = 0;
01118     double *Xcp = X, *ycp = y;
01119     
01120     if (swt) {                  /* created weighted copies of X and y */
01121         Xcp = Alloca(n * p, double),
01122         ycp = Alloca(n, double);
01123         R_CheckStack();
01124         
01125         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ycp[i] = swt[i] * y[i];
01126         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01127             for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01128                 Xcp[i + j * n] = swt[i] * X[i + j * n];
01129     }
01130     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &one, Xcp, &n, &zero, rxy, &pp1);
01131     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, &one, Xcp, &n, ycp, &ione, &zero,
01132                     rxy + p * pp1, &ione);
01133     rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1] = F77_CALL(ddot)(&n, ycp, &ione, ycp, &ione);
01134 }
01135         
01143 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01144 {
01145     SEXP RVXyP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym);
01146     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01147     int j, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01148     int pp1 = p + 1;
01149     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01150         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01151         *rvxy = REAL(RVXyP),
01152         *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01153         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
01154         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01155         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01156         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01157     CHM_SP A =
01158         AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, swt ? lme4_ASym : lme4_CmSym));
01159     CHM_DN cRVXy = AS_CHM_DN(RVXyP), ans;
01160     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01161     R_CheckStack();
01162 
01163     update_L(x);
01164                                 /* Evaluate PAW^{1/2}[X:y] in RVXy */
01165     for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01166         PAWv(rvxy + j * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, X + j * n, n, q);
01167     PAWv(rvxy + p * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, y, n, q);
01168                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01169     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRVXy, &c);
01170     Memcpy(rvxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * pp1);
01171     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01172                                 /* downdate XytXy  */
01173                                 /* Evaluate [X:y]'W[X:y] in RXy */
01174     weighted_XytXy(rxy, swt, X, y, n, p);
01175     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &pp1, &q, mone, rvxy, &q, one, rxy, &pp1);
01176     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &pp1, rxy, &pp1, &j);
01177     if (j)
01178         error(_("Downdated [X:y]'[X:y] is not positive definite, %d."),
01179               j);
01180     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < (pp1 - 1); j++)
01181         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (pp1 + 1)]);
01182     /* update other elements of the deviance slot for LMMs */
01183     if ((!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) &&
01184         (!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym)))) {
01185         d[lpdisc_POS] = 2 * log(rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1]);
01186         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01187             dn * (1 + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2 * PI / dn));
01188         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01189             dnmp * (1. + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01190     }
01191     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01192 }
01193 
01201 SEXP
01202 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01203 {
01204     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01205 }
01206 
01216 SEXP 
01217 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01218 {
01219     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01220     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01221         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01222     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01223                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01224         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01225 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe). */
01226     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01227     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01228     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01229     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01230     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01231     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01232         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01233     R_CheckStack();
01234 
01235     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01236     if (!lmm) {
01237         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01238 
01239         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01240         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01241         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01242         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01243     }
01244                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01245     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01246     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01247                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01248     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01249         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01250     }
01251                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01252     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01253         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01254         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01255         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01256     }
01257     do {
01258         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01259         if (lmm)
01260             fx = update_RX(x);
01261         else {
01262             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01263             update_u(x, verb);
01264             mer_update_dev(x);
01265             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01266         }
01267         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01268     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01269     update_RX(x);
01270     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01271     return R_NilValue;
01272 }
01273 
01274 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01275 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01276 
01289 static double
01290 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01291 {
01292     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01293 
01294     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01295         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01296     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01297         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01298         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01299             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01300                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01301             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01302             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01303         }
01304     }
01305     return ans;
01306 }
01307 
01317 SEXP
01318 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01319 {
01320     SEXP ans;
01321     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01322         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01323     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01324 
01325     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01326         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01327     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01328     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01329     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01330     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01331     R_CheckStack();
01332 
01333     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01334     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01335     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01336     if (j)
01337         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01338     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01339     ansp = REAL(ans);
01340     GetRNGstate();
01341     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01342         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01343         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01344         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01345                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01346         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01347                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01348                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01349 
01350         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01351             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01352                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01353     }
01354 
01355     PutRNGstate();
01356     UNPROTECT(1);
01357     return ans;
01358 }
01359 
01360 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01361 
01362 
01371 static void MCMC_betab(SEXP x, double sigma)
01372 {
01373     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01374         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01375     int ione = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01376     int pp1 = p + 1;
01377     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01378     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01379     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01380     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01381     R_CheckStack();
01382 
01383     mer_update_effects(x);
01384                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01385     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01386     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01387                     &pp1, del2, &ione);
01388     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01389                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01390     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01391     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01392                     &q, del2, &ione, &one, del1, &ione);
01393     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01394     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01395     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01396                                 /* Update the random effects */
01397     update_ranef(x);
01398 }
01399 
01400 static void
01401 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01402 {
01403     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01404     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01405         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01406         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01407 
01408     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01409     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01410     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01411     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01412         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01413         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01414         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01415     }
01416 }
01417 
01418 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01419 {
01420     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01421     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01422         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01423     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01424         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01425     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01426     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01427     R_CheckStack();
01428 
01429     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01430     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01431     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01432     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01433     R_CheckStack();
01434     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01435         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01436         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01437         
01438         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01439         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01440                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01441         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01442         else {
01443             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01444             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01445             if (info)
01446                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01447         }
01448                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01449         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01450         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01451                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01452         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01453                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01454         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01455                         &zero, var, &nci);
01456         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01457             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01458         }
01459         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01460             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01461                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01462                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01463                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01464             }
01465         }
01466         if (nci == 1) {
01467             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01468         } else {
01469             double *sti = st[i];
01470 
01471             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01472                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01473                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01474                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01475             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01476             if (info)
01477                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01478             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01479                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01480                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01481                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01482             }
01483         }
01484     }
01485 }
01486 
01500 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01501                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01502 {
01503     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01504     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01505     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01506         n = dims[n_POS], nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01507         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01508         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01509         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01510     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01511         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01512         *ranef = (double*)NULL, df = n - (dims[REML_POS] ? p : 0);
01513     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01514     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01515 
01516     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01517     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01518     ansp = REAL(ans);
01519     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01520     GetRNGstate();
01521     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01522     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01523 
01524     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01525         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01526                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01527         sigma = exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS]/2)/sqrt(rchisq(df));
01528         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01529         mer_update_effects(x);  /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01530         MCMC_betab(x, sigma); /* Updated beta, u and b */
01531         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01532         if (saveb)                                 /* store b */
01533             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01534         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01535 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     /\* Refactor and evaluate deviance *\/ */
01536         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01537         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01538         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01539     }
01540     PutRNGstate();
01541                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01542     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01543 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01544 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01545     UNPROTECT(2);
01546     return ans;
01547 }
01548 
01561 static char
01562 *chkDims(char *buf, int nb, char *nm, SEXP MP, int nr, int nc)
01563 {
01564     int *dd = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) :
01565         (int *)NULL;
01566 
01567     if (!dd) error(_("Argument MP to chkDims is not a matrix"));
01568     buf[0] = '\0';
01569     if (!isReal(MP) || dd[0] != nr || dd[1] != nc)
01570         snprintf(buf, nb, "Matrix %s must be a %d by %d numeric matrix",
01571                 nm, nr, nc);
01572     return buf;
01573 }
01574 
01575 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01576 
01577 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01578 #endif  
01579 
01588 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01589 {
01590     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01591         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01592         XP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
01593         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01594         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01595         etaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym),
01596         fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01597         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym),
01598         muP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym),
01599         muEtaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01600         offsetP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01601         ranefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01602         residP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym),
01603         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01604         vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym),
01605         weightsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
01606         y = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym);
01607     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01608     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01609         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01610     int neta = n * s;
01611     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01612         C =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01613     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01614     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01615     R_CheckStack();
01616                                 /* check lengths */
01617     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01618         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01619     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01620         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01621     if (LENGTH(y) != n)
01622         return mkString(_("Slot y must have length dims['n']"));
01623     if (LENGTH(muP) != n)
01624         return mkString(_("Slot mu must have length dims['n']"));
01625     if (LENGTH(residP) != n)
01626         return mkString(_("Slot resid must have length dims['n']"));
01627     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01628         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01629     if (LENGTH(fixefP) != p)
01630         return mkString(_("Slot fixef must have length ['p']"));
01631     if (LENGTH(ranefP) != q)
01632         return mkString(_("Slot ranef must have length dims['q']"));
01633     if (LENGTH(uvecP) != q)
01634         return mkString(_("Slot uvec must have length dims['q']"));
01635     if (LENGTH(etaP) != neta)
01636         return mkString(_("Slot eta must have length dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01637     if (LENGTH(weightsP) && LENGTH(weightsP) != n)
01638         return mkString(_("Slot weights must have length 0 or dims['n']"));
01639     if (LENGTH(offsetP) && LENGTH(offsetP) != n)
01640         return mkString(_("Slot offset must have length 0 or dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01641     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01642         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01643         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01644     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01645         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01646         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01647     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01648         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01649     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != neta)
01650         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01651     if (C->nrow != q || C->ncol != neta)
01652         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01653     dd = INTEGER(getAttrib(XP, R_DimSymbol)); 
01654     if (!isReal(XP) || dd[1] != p)
01655         return mkString(_("Slot X must be a numeric matrix with dims['p'] columns"));
01656     if (dd[0] != 0 && dd[0] != (n * s)) /* special case */
01657         return mkString(_("Slot X must be have 0 or dims['n']*dims['s'] rows"));
01658 
01659     nq = 0;
01660     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01661         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01662         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01663         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01664             return
01665                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01666         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01667             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01668         if (!isFactor(fli))
01669             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01670         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01671     }
01672     if (q != nq)
01673         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01674     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RVXy",
01675                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym), q, p + 1)))
01676         return mkString(buf);
01677     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RXy",
01678                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym), p + 1, p + 1)))
01679         return mkString(buf);
01680     return ScalarLogical(1);
01681 }
01682 
01683 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01684 
01694 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01695 {
01696     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01697     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01698         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01699         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01700         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01701         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01702     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01703 
01704     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01705     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01706     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01707         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01708         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01709             F[i] = 0;
01710             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01711         } else {
01712             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01713                 F[i] = 0;
01714                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01715             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01716                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01717                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01718                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01719                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01720                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01721                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01722                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01723                             int ii = ai[k];
01724                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01725                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01726                         }
01727                     }
01728                 }
01729             }
01730         }
01731         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01732     }
01733     return ans;
01734 }
01735 
01736 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01749 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01750 {
01751     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01752     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01753     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01754         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01755         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01756     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01757       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01758     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01759         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01760     R_CheckStack();
01761     
01762     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01763     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01764         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01765         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01766         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01767     }
01768     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01769     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01770     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01771     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01772         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01773         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01774                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01775         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01776         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01777             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01778         }
01779         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01780             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01781         }
01782     
01783         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01784         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01785         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01786         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01787             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01788             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01789             if (S) {
01790                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01791                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01792                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01793                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01794                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01795             }
01796             if (D) {
01797                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01798                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01799             }
01800             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01801             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01802             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01803                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01804                                       * evaluated */
01805         } 
01806     }
01807     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01808     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01809     UNPROTECT(1);
01810     return ans;
01811 }
